{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.21797v1", "title": "Girth in $GF(q)$-representable matroids", "summary": "We prove a conjecture of Geelen, Gerards, and Whittle that for any finite
field $GF(q)$ and any integer $t$, every cosimple $GF(q)$-representable matroid
with sufficiently large girth contains either $M(K_t)$ or $M(K_t)^*$ as a
minor.", "main_category": "math.CO", "categories": "math.CO", "published": "2025-04-30T16:56:04Z"}
